alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Lander, south central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 130 PM PDT... At 1252 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deeth to near Elko to 6 miles southeast of Carlin to near Palisade to near Beowawe. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elko, Carlin, South Fork, Crescent Valley, Pine Valley, Dunphy, Beowawe, Lee, Lamoille, Deeth, Ryndon, Emigrant Pass, Spring Creek, Palisade, Adobe Summit, Lamoille Summit, Emigrant Mine, South Area Mine, Star Valley and Halleck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southwest Elko County
